results.title: Mad Max: beyond thunderdome
results.creator_credit: George Ogilvie, George Miller, Byron Kennedy and Kennedy Miller Productions
results.brief_description: Mad Max continues as the hero who stands alone against barbarians of a post-nuclear age. The action is set in Bartertown, where Max arrives in search of some stolen property and has to fight a duel in the Thunderdome arena. Mel Gibson is joined by Tina Turner in the third Mad Max film. Cast also includes Helen Buday, Frank Thring, Bruce Spence, Robert Grubb, Angry Anderson.
results.creator_credit_for_label: George Ogilvie, George Miller, Byron Kennedy and Kennedy Miller Productions

results.title: Libido
results.creator_credit: David Baker, Fred Schepisi, Tim Burstall, John B Murray and Producers and Directors Guild of Australia
results.brief_description: Libido is a motivating force that guides, directs and even shares a personality. The film’s scope encompasses four people of distinctly different backgrounds - a husband, a child, a family man and a priest. Each is dealt within a separate piece directed by four different filmmakers. Scriptwriters include Hal Porter, Thomas Kenneally and David Williamson. Cast: (The Husband) Elke Neidhardt, Bryon Williams ; (The Child) John Williams, Jill Forster ; (The Priest) Robyn Nevin, Arthur Dignam ; (The Family Man) Jack Thompson, Max Gillies.

results.title: Lady stay dead
results.brief_description: A girl visits her film star sister in a beach resort only to discover clues to a macabre murder. A psychotic gardener preys on his female employers, murdering them in a variety of grisly ways.
results.description: A girl visits her film star sister in a beach resort only to discover clues to a macabre murder. A psychotic gardener preys on his female employers, murdering them in a variety of grisly ways.

results.title: The Irishman
results.creator_credit: Donald Crombie, Anthony Buckley and Forest Home Films
results.brief_description: Based on the novel of the same name by Elizabeth O’Connor. Set in Northern Queensland in the 1920’s, it is the story of a proud Irish Australian teamster and his family as they face the competition from motorised transport. This is the story of a family experiencing events which they cannot control in the face of progress and change. Stars Michael Craig, Simon Burke, Robin Nevin and Bryan Brown.

results.title: Crosstalk
results.creator_credit: Mark Egerton, Errol Sullivan, Filmside Productions and Wall to Wall
results.brief_description: A computer expert crippled in a suspicious accident is now confined to a flat with a nurse. He was originally investigating the malfunctioning of a super computer but now finds himself menaced by the same technology.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mark Egerton, Errol Sullivan, Filmside Productions and Wall to Wall

results.title: The Delinquents
results.creator_credit: Chris Thomson, Mike Wilcox, Alex Cutler, Silver Lining and Village Roadshow Pictures
results.brief_description: Love story about two teenagers in 1950’s Australia whose passion and love for each other breaks not only the rules set down by their parents but also by society. Based on the novel of the same name by Criena Rohan. Stars Kylie Minogue and Charlie Schlatter with Bruno Lawrence, Todd Boyce, Desiree Smith, Melissa Jaffer, Angela Punch-McGregor.

results.title: Dead easy
results.creator_credit: Bert Deling, John Weiley and Firebird Films
results.brief_description: Set in Sydney and supposedly based on actual events, a policeman, prostitute and a hustler become involved in gang war and find that life can be very dangerous. After they cross a small-time bookie they are hunted by every hoodlum in town.

results.title: Smoke 'em if you got 'em
results.brief_description: In smouldering post-nuclear devastation, a periscope protruding from the rubble leads to an underground fall-out shelter where a party is raging in celebration of the big meltdown and will continue until the end of the world as we know it. Irreverent, bizarre comedy, starring Nique Needles and Rob Howard.

results.title: Slate, Wyn and Me
results.creator_credit: Don McLennan, Tom Burstall and Ukiyo Films
results.brief_description: Having robbed a bank and killed a policeman, two brothers kidnap a girl who witnessed it all. Based on the novel, ” Slate and me and Blanche McBride” by Georgia Savage. Stars Sigrid Thornton, Simon Burke and Martin Sacks.

results.title: Fortress
results.creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, Raymond Menmuir and Crawford Productions
results.brief_description: Based on the novel by Gabrielle Lord. A teacher and her class of nine students are kidnapped by four masked men and held for ransom. The victims plot to escape by outwitting their captors.
